tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: lets rub our fat﻿ cocks together
Asain batman? What his name﻿ now Bruce Wang...
2:48 did he steal Aqualad's﻿ weapons?
SUBSCRIBED﻿ :)
that...was...awesome ﻿
Batman﻿ level : shanghai
It's supposed to be real but it's a one off.﻿
Illusion gadget from utility﻿ belt! + higher assassin skills? (my only explanation)
SO﻿ WEIRD BATMAN IS HUMAN NOT SOME TELEPORTING FREAK
... they all did what now?﻿
Holy fuck... this need sto be﻿ a thing...
Well, I read these posts especially because they are flagged as spam, because I want to know, what is so﻿ bad about them :D
Batman Beijing.﻿

かっこよすぎだろｗ 本家よりいいかも
さすがに文化のある国は違うねぇ～﻿
Batman isn't﻿ real, he can be anything

You are right. Another one pointed this out and I replied to this. I don´t have a problem with this whole "help people who are in trouble" thing. I help everybody if I can (of course I´m not a saint... or Batman ^^). I just have a problem with this "everybody... a hero". It just gives a false motivation in my oppinion. Anyone who helps people, goes on with it. Anyone who gives a crap, doesn´t suddenly start helping people, because some guy in a costume beats up criminals.﻿
Why do Chinese always have to take something perfect﻿ and make it flawless? Make it a series please!
Well this is.......﻿ different. And awesome!
no, you chould﻿ know
im stuned. . . i honestly dont﻿ know what to say. . .

Why is it safe to assume that Batman is human? Did you see﻿ him explode into a hundred bats? If it's an alternative universe you can't make any assumptions about these characters based on what you know of the originals.
what the fuck?! do that with your gay﻿ friend's insted!

That is right. I would totally agree with that, but that is nothing special in my oppinion. Then somebody should say it with the words you said: "Everybody can do good stuff, if they want." But that doesn´t sound flashy enough. Everybody who does good things especially to be called a hero, is an﻿ idiot. To be a "hero" you have to do more than e.g. just help somebody out because he/she is lost... At least in my oppinion ^^

Reviewer.School: school is for dikes and its a waste of time

Reviewer.Movies: The Assassination of Jesse James by the coward Robert Ford, Memento, Fight club,District 9, Little miss sunshine, Darjeeling limited, The watchmen, No country for old men, The Santa Clause
Reviewer.Music: David bowie, Gorillaz, IAMX, Beck, Foo fighters, Led Zep, Nirvana, The Temper Trap, robots in disguise, ima robot, chris corner, sneaker pimps, artic monkeys, kings of leon, Johnny cash, Amon tobin, Oueens of the stone age, Moby, Daft Punk, Pendulum, RJD2, Sufjan Stevens, Mint Royale, The Flaming Lips, Chemical Brothers, The strokes, Bloc Party, The Beatles, radiohead, weezer, Yeah yeah yeahs, Sigur Rós, Mark Ronson, Kruder and Dorfmeister, Aphex Twin, Nine Inch Nails, MGMT, Muse, Uncle, Beasty boys, Fat boy slim, Jet, Jamiroquai, Rage against the machine, Justice, Friendly fire, Rolling stones, Ting tings, Devotchka, Sondre Lerche Arcade fire, Coconut records, The Kinks.
